channel.title: Comments on: WordPress 1.5.1.3 Released, Security Update

item.title: By: SonicChicken weblog » Blog Archive » Using WordPress tags? Don’t forget to re-apply the tags patch!
item.dc:creator: SonicChicken weblog » Blog Archive » Using WordPress tags? Don’t forget to re-apply the tags patch!
item.description: [...] Thanks to Joseph and my blogroll, I saw the WordPress 1.5.1.3 security update. I forgot to re-apply the tags patch from Felix Wong’s tags plugin the first time through. Doh! Thanks for posting this, Joseph.   [link] [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Thanks to Joseph and my blogroll, I saw the WordPress 1.5.1.3 security update. I forgot to re-apply the tags patch from Felix Wong’s tags plugin the first time through. Doh! Thanks for posting this, Joseph.   [link] […]
